title: Upland Brewing Company
typeOfFood: Lacto, American, Pizza, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Brew pub. Menu has vegetarian choices including a seitan Philly cheese, black bean burger, meatless loaf sandwich, mushroom pasta, stuffed shells, veggie gyro. Reported using a segregated vegetarian fryer to prevent contamination. Vegans could get the portobello mushroom pizza or seitan tenderloin (bun has milk in it, so ask for multigrain ciabatta bun), coconut tofu or southwest tofu salad, spicy tofu tacos, portobello sandwich, vegetarian chili. Specify vegan to be sure.
